Curve as Text

All curves can be displayed in text format.

On the Curves tab, select Curves Settings. The Curve Settings sidebar will open.

Select the Curve, then Close the list. If it is not listed, it needs to be loaded into the ODF.

On the Display tab, open the Type node and select Text.

Open the Display node and select the Track the text should display on. Note. Remember, this is still a ‘curve’ so should be placed in a curve track.

Tick Display Curve on Layout.

Select Apply.

To change its format (font, interval, justification), remain in the Curve Settings sidebar and on the Text tab, open Curve as text node.

Back Forward
